Parallels.ab: Y24.2 = Y24.7; = Y22.3, Y22.23, Y22.25 with āiiese yešti; = Y25.2 with yazamaide.

haōmauuaitīš gaōmauuaitīš haδānaēpatauuaitīš ~ Y68.1 haōmauuaiti gaōmauuaiti haδānaēpatauuaiti.
